```{r setup, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(collapse = TRUE, comment = "#>")

library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)
library(knitr)
library(targets)
library(tarchetypes)

```

```{r}
tar_make()
```


```{r}
tar_visnetwork()
```

```{r getData_d}
d <- tar_read(target_d)
str(d)
```

```{r basic summaries}

kable(data.frame(ftable(d$date)))
kable(data.frame(ftable(d$Water)))
kable(data.frame(ftable(d$Water, d$date)))
kable(data.frame(ftable(d$species)))

length(unique(d$tag))

```

```{r tag information}

tagN <- d %>% 
  group_by(tag, Water) %>%
  summarize(n = n()) %>%
  filter(tag != "") %>%
  arrange(desc(n))

table(tagN$n)
(table(tagN$Water, tagN$n))

```

```{r getEH}
eh <- tar_read(target_eh)
str(eh)
```
